title: The Magic flute
brief_description: Mozart’s immortal opera is recorded from the internationally renowned Glyndebourne Festival. The magical and mystical qualities in John Cox’s production were reflected in David Hockney’s designs. The production is sung in the original German. Words by Emanuel Schikaneder. Performers include: Leo Goeke, Felicity Lott, Benjamin Luxon, Elizabeth Conquet. The Glyndebourne Festival Opera (Glyndebourne) conducted by Bernard Haitink. London Philharmonic Orchestra led by David Nolan. Staged by John Cox.
